amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part D of House Report 117-110 as en bloc 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 8, 11, 14, 15, 16, 17, 19, 20, 22, 23, 27, 32, 33, 35, and 36.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
